alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:41AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lake of the Woods County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Faunce, or 46 miles southeast of Roseau, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pitt and Graceton around 1205 PM CDT. Baudette around 1210 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
